runs.comm: flighted first delivery, pushed to mid-of. Nice sound off the bat
on a length, middle and leg, worked away to square leg for one
Rahane is off right away. Just a touch short of a length, just a touch wide, and he rocks back to crunch it past cover for four all along the ground
full, just outside off, pushed wide of mid-on for one

South Africa had a few of those early. India get one too. And this would have been swallowed by the slip. On a length, outside off, Rohit pushes at an offbreak, but this doesn't turn and takes the edge for four

the spin start hasn't quite worked. Well it might have had if the slip was in. Rohit down the wicket to this ball, reaches the pitch of it, and drives it straight of mid-off for four. high-quality shot. A mere push, really
on a length, no room, pushed to short straight midwicket. The fielder nearly collides with the non-striker. Parnell is the man
short of a length, just outside off, worked square of point for one
crunched away. This is a poor delivery. A strange defensive cagey start by South Africa to bowl Albie at the top of the innings. This is short, wide, and sits up for a soft boundary
on a length, just outside off, defended back to him
good-looking drive off a length ball, on the up, but straight to cover
this is poor bowling. Short, at Albie's pace. Rohit is forward, but he can still pull it clean over midwicket
and he bowls a wide down leg
short of a length, outside off, dabbed away to third man
short of a length, outside off, soft hands, gets another single
slower ball, 129ks, short of a length, outside off, steered away to third man for one
that's a beauty. That's a Test ball. On a length, outside off, swinging away. Beats the bat as he pushes tentatively
Rohit takes Steyn on. This is brave batting. He makes room, gets inside a short ball, and upper-cuts it for six over the shorter boundary
outswinger this time, on a length, on off, defended from the crease
and he starts with a wide down the leg side
short, wide, angling away, even though Rahane is on the front foot, he manages to cut it cover point. Poor bowling all right, but solid batting from India
looks to cut this, but this isn't short enough or wide enough. Gets a bottom edge to point
slower ball, on a length, gets another bottom edge as Rahane looks to open the face
slower short ball, that's incredibly slow, at 106ks, Rahane connects with the third pull he attempts. Gets a single to short fine

Rohit is gone. He tries to hit this on the up and straight down the ground. The ball is a touch shorter than he expects and he skies it. This has gone nowhere. Faf comes around from mid-on to complete the catch
big wide outside off. Angled too far across
on a length, on off, pushed to mid-off for one
and another - a third - starts with a wide down the leg side
on a length, on the pads, worked away for a single
good pace there, short of a length, 145ks, just outside off, right behind it in defence
short of a length, pitched outside leg, worked away to leg for another single
that's a little edgy. He drags this short ball from outside off, doesn't get all of it, but it flies wide of midwicket
Rahane shimmies away to go over cover, but is beaten by a shortish delivery. Slightly slower. Still 140ks despite rolling his fingers over it
oh that's clean as a whistle. Jumps out of crease, turns this short ball into a length one, and drives it inside-out for a flat six over cover. Beautiful shot
short and wide, but finds that square third man for a single
slower ball, too short and too wide outside off. Called too
looks to run this shortish ball to third man, and is beaten by the angle
that's a good ball. Good bounce for him as he pitches it short of a length just outside off. Beaten by the extra bounce as he drives hard at it
slower ball, bouncer too, Rahane pulls it down to leg for one. he is bowling them back of the hand too
slower ball again, short outside off, he rolls his wrists on this, gets a single to third man
short of a length, quick one this time, Rahane is on his toes to work this to leg. This doesn't go too far so Kohli turns down the single
starts with a full toss on the pads, worked away for one
legbreak, short of a length, on off, not much turn, he is cramped as he looks to open the face
long hop down leg side, pulled away for one
driven hard back at him, misifelded by Tahir for one
wrong'un, on a length, well outside off, dabbed away for one
pushed through quicker and flatter, pushed to long-off for one
short of a length, on off, steered away for one
short, wide, but he doesn't get proper connection on the cut. Takes a single
drives a length ball on the up, gets a single to deep cover
cut away for a single to deep cover. Timed superbly but can't find the gap
slower ball, offcutter, he covers it, dabs it towards third man, Duminy makes a half save at point, and concedes the second
another slower ball, Kohli bunts it towards long-on, with soft hands. He has called for two just as the ball hits the bat. Takes the second easily
chips this to deep midwicket for one
wide down the leg side. There have been quite a few of those tonight
down the wicket, yorks himself up, gets a single to long-on
pushes one across his body, Rahane tries the reverse shot, but is beaten. A shout for the catch by de Kock, but he hasn't touched it
pushed to deep cover for one
on a length, on the pads, another single ensues
down the wicket, mis-hits the shot as he hits down the ground. Doesn't carry to long-on
short of a length, slower ball, at 134ks, Rahane is beaten, but gets a single off the thick outside edge
short of a length, goes off the splice of the bat, for a single to leg

the big Rahane wicket. He charges at Parnell, who bowls a bouncer, Rahane still swings at it without any control. Gets a top edge. AB makes a lot of ground from deep midwicket, and turns this into a comfortable catch
short of a length, moves across the line, works this to leg for one
short of a length, wide, cut away to third man for one
short of a length, angling across, guided to third man for one
Kohli takes charge now. Down the wicket, right to the pitch, clean-swings it over long-on. India too bowled Raina in the 11th over. Duminy bowling one too many too?
bunted into the leg side, Kohli wants two as deep midwicket runs in to field, but Yuvraj turns his down
flighted on off, pushed to cover
. This has turned after pitching middle and leg, and squared him up, but it is missing off
down the wicket, drives this elegantly to long-off for one
on a length, on the pads, Kohli retains the strike with a single
gets a bottom edge on this attempt to cut. Gets a single to short third
flighted, middle and leg, defended back to him
wrong'un, pitches just outside leg, Yuvraj picks it, plays the defensive shot, gets a single to short third
down the wicket, Tahir pulls the length back, drives this to long-off for one
looks to charge him, ends up yorking himself up as Tahir slips in the quicker one
wrong'un again, but too far outside off, and is called wide even though he beats him
quick short delivery, pulled away to deep midwicket for one
on a length, outside off, he steers it to third man for one
short, pitched outside leg, regulation pace, he goes back and pulls it wristily over short fine. Think this has carried all the way for six. Replays show it hasn't. Just bounced inside
short of a length, dabbed away to short third for one, Tahir's throw is not backed up properly at short midwicket. They take the second
slower short ball, he rides the bounce, works this to leg with soft hands, and he calls Yuvraj for another second. And they make it as deep square leg has to run in
beautiful slower bouncer. Kohli is flummoxed. Gets a bottom edge, which luckily for him doesn't hit the stumps
slower ball outside off, Kohli doesn't time the cut. Gets just the single
down the wicket, not quite to the pitch of it, drills this to long-off for one. Miller does well there to keep them down to one
short of a length, turns back in from outside off, Yuvraj gets an edge as he goes back, but there is no no slip
quicker ball, accurate, middle and leg, worked away to leg for one
down the wicket, yorks himself up, gets a single to long-on
wrong'un, a touch too short, pulled away to deep midwicket for one
charges at him again, not there to the pitch of it, gets a single to wide long-off
slower ball, middle and leg, pushed to long-on for one
on a length, angling across, steered away to third man for one
short ball, but they have the deep midwicket there for the pull
on a length, no room, pushed to cover for one
flicks away a full ball, and South Africa have a deep midwicket. That is a good fielding position for Kohli
Yuvraj produces the boundary to ruin the over for Steyn. This is a lovely stroke too. Slower ball from Steyn, a half-volley, and he lofts it over mid-off. Well picked by Yuvraj
full and wide, he drives this after stepping put, but a dive by Faf at cover keeps them down to one
short legbreak, on the pads, Yuvraj tries to beat short fine leg, but Steyn puts in a full-length dive to save three runs
swept away, against the turn, straight of deep midwicket, takes two

Kohli gets to fifty in style. What a big innings this is turning out to be. Slogs this legbreak from outside off. They have had a deep midwicket for him, and he clears the field. He takes the risk, but backs himself enough
googly, he picks it late, is outside the crease, and he dabs it for one
AB flies. Ab catches. Is there a twist still? Yuvraj gets too close to this one as he tries to go over long-off. Doesn't get the elevation. AB runs in and takes the catch with a dive
bowls the slower short ball, Raina premeditates the move away from the stumps, leaves this alone. Looks for a wide call but this isn't
this one is wide, though. Another slower ball. Too far outside off
short ball with fine leg up, and too soft a short ball. Only ribs high. Pulled away over short fine leg for six. This is a top edge, but has gone the distance
wide yorker, Raina plays this well. He quirts it to the left of third man, comes back for two
two edges in one over, and Raina gets 10 off them. Poor choices from Parnell, though. Slower bouncer, but too wide, and the edge goes fine of third man

that's 14 off edges in this over. Raina is carrying edges of god here. Makes room, clearly late on the full ball, gets the inside edge to the right of the keeper. Kohli doesn't mind how they are coming. He is super pumped
yorker, on off, Raina keeps it out, but you would feel they have had the one over they needed
and he starts with a wide. Is it getting to South Africa now? Down leg here
short of a length, flicked away to deep midwicket for one
makes room to cut, gets a single to third man

what wrists there from Kohli. How has he got that power with just a flick. On a length, middle and leg, and he has used that bottom hand to get this aerial shot wide of long-on. Kohli is pumped. Super pumped
lovely outswinger, just outside off, Kohli looks to drive to cover, but is beaten by the movement away
short of a length, angling in, pushed towards deep midwicket, Kohli puts pressure for the second, Amla misfields running in
this game is all over now. He shimmies down the wicket, gets inside and under a shortish delivery, and goes over point for four. This is some innings from Kohli
short of a length, angling in, Raina gets inside the line, pulls it down, beats short fine leg
slower bouncer, outside off, Raina doesn't want to have anything to do with it
Raina doesn't complete the job, but he has played his part. Short of a length, outside off, a nothing shot as he tries to clear mid-off, and ends up lobbing it to the man
and India don't even need Kohli. Short, waist high, poor bowling really at that pace. Pulled away for four through square leg
slower bouncer, Kohli shimmies down and pulls this to deep midwicket for one
slower short ball, Dhoni stand still, and leaves it for Kohli to finish with a defensive shot off the last ball

Kohli finishes it off. And he lets out a roar. What a knock under high pressure. What a chaser he is. This is like Yuvraj finishing that quarter-finals chase off against Australia. What release of pressure. He has soaked it all in, and ends it with a flick past midwicket
